2925:0: dharmadhātustava dharmadhāto' namas tubhyaṃ sarvasattveṣv avasthita|
2925:2: <1> ye eva dhātuḥ saṃsāre śodhyamānaḥ sa eva tu|
2925:3: śuddhaḥ sa eva nirvāṇe dharmakāyaḥ sa eva hi||
2925:4: <2> yathā hi kṣīrasammiśaraṃ sarpimaṇḍaṃ na dṛśyate tathā hi kleśasammiśro dharmadhātur na dṛśyate||
2925:7: <4> yathā dīpo ghaṭastho hi na kiñcid avabhāsate|
2925:8: tathā kleśaghaṭastho hi dharmadhātur na bhāsate||
2925:9: <5> (1) yena yena hi pārśvena cchidrībhavati tad ghaṭam|
2925:10: tena tena hi pārśvena raśmayas tasya nirgatāḥ||
2925:11: <6> yadā samādhivajreṇa bhinnaṃ bhavati tad ghaṭam|
2925:13: <7> dharmadhātur na cotpanno na niruddhaḥ kadācana|
2925:16: pāṣāṇakośe sañchannam ābhā tasya na rājate||
2925:18: nāsau bhrājati saṃsāre nirvāṇe tu prabhāsvaraḥ||
2925:21: gotre asati vyāyāmaḥ śramaḥ kevalam iṣyate||
2925:22: <11> yathā hi tuṣasañchannaṃ na dhānyaṃ tat phalaṃ matam|
2925:23: tathā hi kleśasañchanno nāsau buddheti kalpyate||
2925:24: <12> yathā hi tuṣanirmuktaṃ tat phalaṃ pratibhāsate|
2925:26: <13> upamā kriyate loke kadalyā nāsti sāratā|
2925:28: <14> evaṃ hy asāre saṃsāre nirvṛte kleśasāgare|
2925:30: <15> evaṃ hi sarvabījeṣu sādṛśyāṃ jāyate phalam|
2925:31: bījair vinā phalaṃ nāsti kaḥ prājñaḥ pratipatsyate||
2925:32: <16> bījabhūtas tv asau dhātur dharmāṇām āśrayo mataḥ|
2925:34: <17> nirmālau candrasūryau hi āvṛtau pañcabhir malaiḥ|
2925:36: <18> evaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ cittam āvṛtaṃ pañcabhir malaiḥ|
2925:38: <19> (4) agniśaucaṃ yathā vastraṃ malinaṃ vividhair malaiḥ|
2925:39: agnimadhye yathā kṣiptaṃ malaṃ dagdhaṃ na vastratā||
2925:40: <20> evaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ cittaṃ malinaṃ rāgajair malaiḥ|
2925:41: jñānāgninā malaṃ dagdhaṃ na dagdhaṃ tat prabhāsvaram||
2925:42: <21> śūnyatāhārakāḥ sūtrā ye kecid bhāṣitā jinaiḥ|
2925:43: sarvais taiḥ kleśavyāvṛttir naiva dhātor vināśanam||
2925:46: <23> dharmadhātur yato nātmā na ca strīnṛnapuṃsakaḥ|
2925:48: <24> sarve dharmā hy asaṃsaktāḥ strīpuṃstvaṃ hi na vidyate|
2925:52: <26> yathā hi garbho garbhiṇyāṃ vidyate na ca dṛśyate|
2925:53: tathā hi kleśasañchannaṃ dharmatattvaṃ na dṛśyate||
2925:59: <29> yathā śaśaviṣāṇāṃ hi kalpyamānaṃ na vidyate|
2925:60: tathā hi sarvadharmeṣu kalpitaṃ naiva vidyate||
2925:62: yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt tasya kiṃ kalpyate buddhaiḥ||
2925:64: ekasya sambhavo nāsti kathaṃ bālair vikalpyate||
2925:71: <35> grīṣmakāle yathā vāri uṣṇam ity abhidhīyate|
2925:72: tad eva śītakāleṣu śītam ity abhidhīyate||
2925:74: (8) tad eva kleśāpagamād buddha ity abhidhīyate||
2925:75: <37> cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca avabhāsāḥ sunirmalāḥ|
2925:77: <38> śrotram pratītya śabdaṃ ca cittaṃ vijñaptayas trayaḥ|
2925:87: <43> paśyate śṛṇute ghrāti svādate spṛśatīti ca|
2925:89: <44> cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca ghrāṇaṃ ca jihvā kāyo manas tathā|
2925:91: <45> (10) cittam eva dvidhā dṛṣṭaṃ loki lokottaraṃ ca yat|
2925:92: ātmagrāheṇa saṃsāraḥ pratyātma tathātā hi tat||
2925:93: <46> rāgakṣayo hi nirvāṇaṃ dveṣamohakṣayaś ca yat|
2925:95: <47> asmiṃ kalevare sarvaṃ jñānam ajñānam eva ca|
2925:97: <48> bodhir na dūre nāsanne na gatā nāpi vāgatā|
2925:102: <50> na bodher dūraṃ sañjñī syān na sāsannā ca sañjñinaḥ|
2925:105: kṣīraṃ pibanti haṃsā hi udakaṃ ca tathā sthitam||
2925:106: <52> evaṃ hi kleśasammiśraṃ jñānam ekatra bhājane|
2925:107: pibanti yogino jñānam ajñānaṃ sphorayanti te||
2925:108: <53> ahaṃ mameti vā grāho yāvad bāhyo vikalpyate|
2925:112: kalpayanti dvayaṃ bālā advayaṃ yogināṃ padam||
2925:115: <56> vīryaṃ ca sarvadharmeṣu dhyāne cittaṃ pracāritam|
2925:116: prajñāyām acalaṃ nityaṃ bodhipuṣṭir iyaṃ punaḥ||
2925:134: <64> yathaiva bālacandrasya dṛṣṭā vṛddhiḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe|
2925:135: tathā bhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ dṛṣṭā vṛddhiḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe||
2925:136: <65> yathā hi pañcadaśyāṃ vai pūrṇacandro hi jāyate|
2925:138: <66> adhimuktidṛḍhaṃ yasya buddhe dharme ca nityaśaḥ|
2925:139: utpādayati tac cittam anivartyam bhave bhave||
2925:142: <68> malimaṃ nityakālaṃ hi rāgādyair vividhair malaiḥ|
2925:143: malābhāve ca yā śuddhiḥ vimalety abhidhīyate||
2925:149: durjayānāṃ hi kleśānāṃ vijayā tu sudurjayā||
2925:158: <76> kāyaṃ jñānamayaṃ rāmyam ākāśam iva nirmalam|
2925:164: tvam acintyo'si sarveṣāṃ kas tvā vijñātum arhati||
2925:173: <83> daśabhiś ca balair bālas tiṣṭhate bālacandravat|
2925:175: <84> yadā pretāḥ samantāt tu śuṣkaṃ paśyanti sāgaram|
